website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight, neutral colored, mid-level sauna comes with everything you need for relaxation on the go, and is energy efficient to boot.
pros: 5 temperature levels to customize your experience
just plug in, zip up, relax, and enjoy
Polyester “satin” material exterior is moisture resistant
We love the low-EMF carbon fiber heat panel
cons: Some models don’t heat up enough
Inside chair could be larger and more comfortable
may not be well suited for big/tall adults

customer_reviews.title: Day 2 caught on fire
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday. Used it twice. And the third time preheating the machine, it caught fire. I will never recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Momster

customer_reviews.title: Just like advertised. Get one!
customer_reviews.text: I was paying $20 per session at a local spa. I need to do the sauna 3-4 times a week for Lyme disease so it was getting pricey. I found this one on here and was like there is no way that thing will work. Well I was completely wrong!! This works exactly like the spa version as far as sweat goes and it 100% relieved my joint pain. Keep in mind the price it is great for what you pay. The chair is uncomfortable and I will probably get a stool but other than that this is a winner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... using this sauna for over a year now and love it. I truly feel I am getting a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this sauna for over a year now and love it. I truly feel I am getting a good de-tox. I am dealing with cancer and arthritis and it is helping in both areas. For the last month or so I have been using it every day. It is definitely worth the price. Update: I have used this sauna for about 15 months, daily, and this week the side panel went out, so the unit no longer heats enough to provide any benefits. I figure for the amount of use I got of it, it is worth it buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Scott

customer_reviews.title: We love this thing
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing! Many of the other posts are correct, you have to make it work for you a little. The towel around the neck and over the zippers makes a huge improvement. Also, we recommend setting it at 150 for 10 minutes before using. This also helps speed up the process of getting the sweat to start. You can back it down later if it's too hot. For the money, and size this thing is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Ashcraft

customer_reviews.title: WARNING - DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: I switched it on, it worked for not even 1 minute, switched off and won't go back on. Waste of money. Don't buy!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Black

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Used it 3 times before it stopped working. I didn't break a sweat even when it was working, body got a little warm and moist but that was it. I've had one in the past from a different manufacturer which caused profuse sweating that would drip off my body, so I know how it's supposed to work. I already got rid of packaging, and it would not be an easy product for which to find packaging, so I guess it's going into the trash. There's not even a way to contact the seller!
customer_reviews.author: maj

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as having maximum temperature of 150 degrees. That is not even remotely true. Here's the proof. The photo is of a thermometer left inside for 1 hour, cranked at maximum temperature, inside a very hot garage on a sunny day. Barely reached 90 degrees. I guess you get what you paid for. Not even remotely the effects of a sauna.
customer_reviews.author: matv

customer_reviews.title: Waiste of time and money .
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth,it just kept me warm and didn’t make me sweat at all , I purchased this product based on reviews how could they just say something which is not right . It was utter waiste if time and money . Once the temperature reach 150 it stops working and if you want to increase feom 130 to up the reading jumps to 140 and then to 150 . I am disappointed with this this product.
customer_reviews.author: anjum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing heat for $136!
customer_reviews.text: Well if you are one of those who "can never get warm" during the Winter and have severely limited space/money/time/energy/etc...this may be for you! IMHO you get 82% of the benefits of a "real" sauna (excepting the atmosphere) out of this friendly satiny Chinese contraption. As others have said, you need to sit in it for perhaps longer than you thought (half hour or more definitely) with heat set at 150, but but one does certainly get hot and sweaty. It could become your Winter friend.
customer_reviews.author: M Rutkauskas

customer_reviews.title: Love My Far Infra Red Sauna
customer_reviews.text: Love this easy to use Sauna. I use the lowest temperature setting (115 degrees) so that I can comfortably sit in the sauna for a longer period of time (30-60 minutes). I like to use this sauna in the evening while watching TV just before going to bed as its very relaxing. I have had my sauna now for 2 years and it still works great. I did try going to a spa before buying it but there was only one spa that had a far infra red room, it cost $20/session and then they went out of business. At $20/hour this sauna paid for itself in 8-9 days.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Gyi

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love saunas, in general. My gym doesn't have one & I wanted the convenience of having one at home. I've had this almost a year & couldn't be happier with it! I use it almost daily in the winter, fall & spring months. I put a towel on the floor of the sauna & sit on that. It's so convenient to have this at home! I haven't figured out how to fold it back up so I can travel with it, in spite of following the directions. If you purchase this, I'd recommend taking video when you initially open it up. Hopefully that will assist you when you want to fold it up again. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Would give no stars if i could
customer_reviews.text: it definitely does NOT get to 150 degrees which means the sweat session isn't as good as i had hoped. and is pretty uncomfortable. Not worth the money. Even with complaints the company doesnt reach out our try to fix any problems. Bad reviews all around. Such a waste
customer_reviews.author: Angela Marie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I love my far infrared sauna. It shipped quickly and it's exactly what it said. I'm doing what another user said he did, I sit completely inside it and do my morning meditations while I take a sauna. It's heat settings are 131, 140 and 150. I heard the owner of another very large and reputable far infrared sauna company say that you don't need to set it high to get the benefits, so you can actually leave it at the lowest setting of 131 and enjoy it more because it's not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Louie in Southern Cali

customer_reviews.title: I returned it
customer_reviews.text: The Sauna does not heat up to 140 degrees. I used a thermometer to measure the temperature. The readings varied from 100 to 126 degrees. It took me almost an hour to start sweating. I returned it for a refund and bought the Ridgeyard Infrared Sauna instead. It works g better and costs less!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Need to offer larger size for taller, larger folks
customer_reviews.text: This set up works fine if you are petite, which I'm not, 5'8", chair inclined is for a child leg bracket is sharp under lower thigh, tried with a different chair and you have to squeeze in like a sardine, ad photo is deceptive, as someone my size or larger is forced to sit hunched over due to head opening location. Unit does warm up very quickly. I would suggest having two sizes to choose from so taller, larger people can be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie M.

customer_reviews.title: I have been using it for about 6 months and have no problems and it works great. I'm so happy I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I highly rate this spa. I have been using it for about 6 months and have no problems and it works great. I'm so happy I bought it. It does exactly what it says. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding.....
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding... Two tips from this Sauna junkie... get yourself a tripod stool on Amazon and a small water misting bottle.. The misting bottle turns this effective dry sauna into an over the top steam bath with just a few mists of water... The chair that it comes with is fine but a tripod stool exposes more of your body to the direct heat... Folds away and slips under the bed.. Again, an Outstanding purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: So hot!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sauna! I'm 5'1" and 115 lbs, so I found the chair to be plenty big, but my boyfriend who is 6' and 190 lbs definitely thought it was too small. I find that it gets quite hot. I usually start it at 150 to warm it up, and then after 15 min or so, I turn it down to 140 bc it really does get hot. I don't know if it's gonna solve all of my problems, but it definitely feels awesome and makes me sweat.
customer_reviews.author: melinurse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I got in the habit of using the sauna at my gym after working out, because it helps you stretch, relax, and flush out toxins. I wanted something that I could use at home, especially after moving into what was essentially a rain forest. The cold damp would really make me sluggish and achy, but 20 minutes or so in this sauna, along with a big jug of water to drink, and I felt way better!! I absolutely swear, everybody should do this every day, we would all be so much happier. Don't hesitate, this is an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hull

customer_reviews.title: and stores easily in my closet (that is not a walk in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this sauna since January, 2018. I use it 3-4 times a week, for 30 minutes. I am using it to detox from CIRS. I sweat in it every time! It works as it should, sets up and folds back down in under 5 min. and stores easily in my closet (that is not a walk in closet). I would highly recommend it. It is working exactly as I thought it would. It doesn't have any off-gassing smell at all, even from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra F.

customer_reviews.title: Use a shower cap and scarf to keep heat in
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend!!! I have MTHFR & COMT mutations so I needed something to help detox heavy metals. I did follow other reviews tips and I usually wear a shower cap and a scarf around my neck to keep the heat in and it gets HOT!! I sweat a ton doing it and start sweating within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Heat at home
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought what have I done. But I use it almost daily. Must stay 20 or above to get good sweat. Problem you have to set straight to avoid touching the back heater. Hot ouch. But for dollars spent good deal. I do heat shower then ice plunge. Also look lowest price. Different sellers same product different prices look around but this seller fast and best price at time
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. I have enough space in my bathroom to leave it up; but will put it in the closet when company comes. It definitely warms up. I run it for 20 to 30 minutes at 131 degrees, and finish off with 10 minutes of 140 degrees; great sweat to remove toxins. However, my back gets overheated; not sure if the silver panel is supposed to be there or not. The chair is also uncomfortable, especially if you want to sit in lotus and meditate :-) Will try to find a better chair...But a pretty good solution for a newbie sauna wannabe.
customer_reviews.author: David Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Really makes you sweat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy product that you can place almost anywhere! Both my wife and I use it when we can. I'm not entirely sure how well it truly works for my health, but I seem to feel better after I use it. We sweat quite a bit, so on that alone the product works as stated. I just hope long term benefits are there too! For the price, I'd say it's worth the purchase if anyone is considering it. I've had it well over a year and still working nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Kory Polk

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love sitting in saunas at my local gym and wanted to have the convenience of doing it at home, at my leisure. This product allows for that. The only issue I have is the comfort of the chair, trying to sit up straight for any long period of time, because I like to sit in it for about 20 to 30 minutes and my back starts hurting. My solution was to close the flap on the top, put a towel on the floor and just sit on the floor with my legs crossed. Works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Orr

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far! When I’m finished I’m sitting in a pool of sweat . It’s definitely worth the buy. Once I’m done i leave it open to allow it to air dry . I’m 105Lbs so if you weigh more you should have no issues breaking a good sweat .
customer_reviews.author: td***

customer_reviews.title: INCONSISTENT HEATING, EMF LEVEL NOT INDICATED.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this 4x and the heating is very inconsistent. I do not think it reaches 150 degrees. The company says in their website product PDF that you can’t use it for more than 3x a week with more than 30 mins per session. How can that be? When it doesn’t even make me sweat for 40 mins - similar to what people here are saying. I also contacted the company on the EMF measure of this and I have not gotten any response. I am looking at other portable saunas here in Amazon and will return this one if the company does not answer me in a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: Aeva A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got my dad this sauna because he use to drive to the gym every night just to use the sauna. He loves it and was so excited about it. He said it gets really hot and only take a couple minutes to get ready. You can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for relaxing and weight loss.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second product! I love it and have come to rely on it for stress relief and weight loss. It’s easy to use, just remember to clean up and wipe down afterwards. Heat is appropriate for relaxation and timer is helpful for keeping your sessions short. My last one got so much usage that I wore it out after 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: JMack

customer_reviews.title: It is very convenient for me to watch TV while I'm inside it or if I would like to relax in a different room and have the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am definitely enjoying my sauna. It is very convenient for me to watch TV while I'm inside it or if I would like to relax in a different room and have the lights off I can do that as well. My only issue is the temperature only gets up to 150 degrees. For me to get a good sweat it normally takes 15 minutes for that starts to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: It is very convenient to have something like this when you don't have much space to spare
customer_reviews.text: This sauna is fairly small and seems energy efficient. It is very convenient to have something like this at home. I suppose you could even transport it if you were so inclined. I have used it quite a bit over the past 10 months or so, a bit more often in the cold months. I wish it got a little bit hotter; it's pretty good though.
customer_reviews.author: tarboulton

customer_reviews.title: It takes about 15 minutes to warm up
customer_reviews.text: I turn it on for 10 minutes before I get in. Then, it takes about 15 minutes for your body to warm up and begin sweating - longer in colder weather. I keep hitting the timer to add more time. I stay in it sweating for about 20 minutes. So, I use it about an hour each day. It's compact enough to keep in a corner. You will start to sweat - just give it time.
customer_reviews.author: user

customer_reviews.title: Not bad...could be better
customer_reviews.text: I would like it better if it stayed in place better while in the sauna...it does feel wonderful just would be better if I could relax while in without pushing the sides out all the time
customer_reviews.author: annmo

customer_reviews.title: Great way to detox.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth sauna of this type. I love how easy this one is to disassemble. I also love that you don't have to heat the foot pads. Overall, it's the best one I've purchased with the best price. The only thing I don't like is that I can't tell what the temperature is.
customer_reviews.author: mojo

customer_reviews.title: Use common sense
customer_reviews.text: As long as you use common sense, this sauna is easy to use and effective. Obviously, if you let the heat escape because you have your arm through the designated arm holes, you aren’t going to get the super sweaty result you want. You if you keep the arm holes shut and the neck hole shut with a towel, you will sweat a ton. Let it heat up before you enter. Super happy with my purchase. Bought this as a ‘starter’ to see if I liked it before purchasing a full size.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Katherine Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Heats fast and takes up very little ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Heats fast and takes up very little space, would buy again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The chair in this sauna is a horrible chair and extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The chair in this sauna is a horrible chair and extremely uncomfortable. Had I know I would've purchased the larger sauna. I'm trying to find some chair that will fit in this small sauna that I can actually be comfortable in for 20 minutes. The chair that came with this wouldn't even be comfortable for a child, which is the size it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical that it was not at all going ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that it was not at all going to compare to a real sauna. Well I was definitely sweating and take back all of my doubts in this product. It should prove to work well in assisting me on my weight loss journey.
customer_reviews.author: Delicia R Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great night sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Easy to hide away and pull out. Sleep quality on nights I do the sauna is perfect. Very hot! And maintains temp through the whole cycle. Have recommended to everyone. Plus my skin condition is much better. Less ance and eczema. And I enjoy my time in there. Feels like a mini thrill ride. The seat is the only con. I put a towel folded up in the middle and that helps prop me out of the hole. Others have sat on a bucket.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for 6 weeks now. I use it 6 days a week and it never has any issues. Material is reliable and sturdy. I can easily fold it up for storing. Wipes clean on the inside, leaves some sweat stains on the outside but its of no concern to me. Great product. I feel great after using it. Its aided me in losing 20 lbs in these past 6 weeks so far.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Letitia Faamausili

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I got interested in the portable sauna after visiting an infrared Himalayan salt sauna. The product does heat up your core nicely, and you can’t get a decent sweat out of it to detox at home. My only problem with it is the smell. It has a chemical/toxic odor and that’s the point point to DETOX . I thought it might dissipate after being unboxed a while but it has not.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppyChicaForCheap

customer_reviews.title: So relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of joint and hip pain. This has been so beneficial for me. I use it almost daily for 20- 30 minutes. Its super quick to set up, takes maybe 2 minutes. My fiance lives across the state so I pack it up often and take it with me when I drive to see her. I would highly recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite "toy!"
customer_reviews.text: My ENT advised me to get a portable sauna for pain relief (Mixed Connective Tissue Disease with muscle, joint, etc pains). Even though I have Sjogren's, I still sweat like a beast after 25 minutes. It can relieve my pain for a short while after I get out. I'm perfectly comfortable while in it. We put it inside a shower we weren't using, but it is easy to move around. I like to run a humidifier , some essential oils, and some Netflix in the dark while I sit in my sauna. RELAXATION! It also heats up fast.
customer_reviews.author: April Bash

customer_reviews.title: If you are tall, you will not fit well inside this with the provided seat.
customer_reviews.text: Sauna does not work well for taller people - my son and I (at 5' 10") could not sit properly inside it with the provided seat. And, I did not want to try and find another seat that would work for us without being damaged by the heat. The picture shown must be somebody less than 5' 5" tall! So, I had to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Raeena Lari

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: -Works just as well as MIT GYM sauna. It took 30 min vs 20 min @MIT to achieve the same result for me. -To keep heat from escaping, I wrapped a towel around my neck. - Well designed with all double zippers: pulling from both inside and outside. -love the fact that I can watch my favorite TV show while sweating out for 30 min. -ability to sweating out @at home anytime to reduce stress.
customer_reviews.author: Enlighted Parent

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, love this thing .. takes me about 20 min to really start sweating, but then I'm like a rain forest for as long as I can stand. Which is a lot longer than being inside a sauna as I can't stand to inhale the hot air.
customer_reviews.author: Daxx

customer_reviews.title: Nice sauna, Mine is flawed
customer_reviews.text: This sauna is great and I would give it 5 stars however the velcro on the neck doesn't work - both sides are the loop. There should be one side that is hook and one side loop so it binds together. I have to wrap a hand towel around my neck to keep it sealed otherwise the heat escapes The unit heats up quickly and as long as you keep your zippers closed the heat is retained. The foot heater is a necessity since it feels like the upper body gets most of the heat.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: purchased as a gift for my girlfriend and she has ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a gift for my girlfriend and she has used it a few times and her only issue is that the front portion of the sides do not produce heat. Since she is using it primarily for her legs she uses it standing.
customer_reviews.author: rey

customer_reviews.title: Tested internal temperature with a Thermapen thermometer and the temperature ...
customer_reviews.text: Tested internal temperature with a Thermapen thermometer and the temperature only reached 109 degrees. This was after preheating for 20 minutes and using it for 30 minutes in a 70 degree room. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Snow White

customer_reviews.title: Love this portable Spa! Feel the heat!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, and reasonably priced. Heats up quickly, and does the job! You really cannot compare this to a stand alone structure that costs more and has more heating panels, because for something that "pops up" and is storable, it does emit a great amount of heat with the three heating elements as well as heated foot pad. You will definitely feel the heat, and sweat according to your body type. Great for a home gym or spa.
customer_reviews.author: Gertrude Strindberg

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and does not take up much time
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and does not take up much time. You cant beat the price, I was paying 30 buck a pop for each 30min session. This is better to me because my head is out, no wet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie DeGrate

customer_reviews.title: Works like it says
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for when it comes to this product. It can 100% get a sweat going but it will take a little bit. In my opinion it should be for people at least under 6ft maybe 6ft at MAX. Im 6’3 and this thing is nearly impossible to fit into lol. However it works well and does exactly what its designed to do!
customer_reviews.author: Cody P

customer_reviews.title: This is very easy to use and move around in your house
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom to use following chemo. This is very easy to use and move around in your house.
customer_reviews.author: T.A.L

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item... I am soaked after the 30 minutes have ended.
customer_reviews.author: beanie55

customer_reviews.title: Helps Lyme disease symptoms
customer_reviews.text: Sauna was super easy to set up. I felt like I was taking a gamble purchasing this item but I am very happy with it. Great Lyme disease symptom relief.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: good investment
customer_reviews.text: this personal sauna is a great buy. not too expensive and it actually works. after a good workout then to sit in this sauna . feels great afterwards. my daughter and I both love it.
customer_reviews.author: victoria dobson

customer_reviews.title: I am happy
customer_reviews.text: Very relaxing. I just want to fall asleep in it. Very easy to set up, clean, and take down.
customer_reviews.author: lc

customer_reviews.title: Bought "New"
customer_reviews.text: I bought this new, but it had obviously been used before. The pole to give the front its shape was broken. And the bottom and sides had burn/melting marks from the heating pad. No way was I going to use it if it could melt itself.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to sweat
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the heat it generates without the steam aspect. 30 minutes at the highest setting and I am drenched with sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Phillips, D.O.

customer_reviews.title: I love it a good way to relax at home on ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it a good way to relax at home on winter. I use my salt scrub before entering the sauna and used it for 30mnts daily. It certainly was good splurge for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Natasya

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to purchase this product as an affordable at-home sauna. The product looks, feels, and behaves as described in other reviews. I returned the product because it did not achieve a high enough temperature. The highest setting is 150 degrees, though the inside did not approach this level. I tried the various recommendations from other buyers to increase the interior temperature, but was still not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Gluck

customer_reviews.title: HOT ! And perfect to Store AWAY! :)
customer_reviews.text: So far soooo good !! I love how portable it is and how hot it gets. Also I can close it up and put it in my close! perfect for small apartments.. slides right in and behind stuff :)
customer_reviews.author: Bethanythelmt

customer_reviews.title: Love my sauna
customer_reviews.text: My relax moment in the day. Saving energy. Get out toxinas, and get out the pain in my back. Excellent equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Very Happy Customer here!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product about 3 weeks ago and have used it everyday. I am VERY HAPPY with is this! Within 15-17 minutes I am sweating profusely. I feel great and my skin is thanking me!
customer_reviews.author: dennis hart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sauna. Warms me up. Easy to carry set up and put away. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: gerry

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have use this sauna three times now and it works great! Compared to the sauna at the spa I sweat just as much if not more in this one. It heats up quickly and hold its temperature. I'm looking forward to saving a lot of money not having to visit the spa every week! 😊
customer_reviews.author: lovinmyboys

customer_reviews.title: I love my sauna
customer_reviews.text: I love my sauna. I can do my sauna session in my own bathroom and not having to go to all the trouble of driving , carrying things ,preping just to get to a spa or sauna place.
customer_reviews.author: Amor

customer_reviews.title: Takes 30 min to heat up so heat it before ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes 30 min to heat up so heat it before getting in. Hard to break a sweat but if you stay in about an hour it will get you there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is easy to set up and use. And after getting out you dont feel over heated. And definitely sweat. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: August Lee Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected to work up a good sweat. If you did, it would take more than an hour. The machine shuts off at 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Vince C.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for the money. Works great. The chair is a little small but otherwise good!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Baber

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for detoxification treatment
customer_reviews.text: I am REALLY enjoying my sauna. Great investment for detoxification treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Nice Top
customer_reviews.text: I sleep in beige color and I wear the red and the black one outside.
customer_reviews.author: PAT

customer_reviews.title: Low
customer_reviews.text: I love it, Just sits a bit low for me, I am about 5'8. I am going to try a taller chair because my legs feel cramped and curled.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable if you’re over 5ft tall
customer_reviews.text: Chair is uncomfortable and to low to sit as a 5ft 8in female. No leg room or floor space to place my feet comfortably. Really was looking forward to using this for knee pain. Most of the heat warms the upper body. Had to put in on the highest temperature for 30 min to feel any results. So disappointing after waiting so long to get it.
customer_reviews.author: NIcol R. James

customer_reviews.title: best thing ive ever bought
customer_reviews.text: best thing ive ever bought. I love it. its reliable, its hot, it works fast, its a great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Love my portable sauna
customer_reviews.text: Love my portable sauna. It's the perfect for one person and heats up the body quickly. I'm dripping sweat and detoxing just fine. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MelB

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT hear up enough. It's just warm, at most, even with turning it on beforehand. Don't waste your money. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: T. Toles

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for someone who loves a sauna!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present for my son's father - and he tells me almost every time we speak that it's the best gift he's ever received! He also dropped his gym membership since he was only going for the sauna!
customer_reviews.author: MKellar

customer_reviews.title: Spamazing
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenience of having a sauna that doesn't take up too much space . Gives a good sweat but after more than the 30 minute max. But other wise use it often .
customer_reviews.author: lashanda lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Infared
customer_reviews.text: Heats up fast and Zi begin sweating fast. Feeling great since using this.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Saunders

customer_reviews.title: this is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this sauna! I preheat it for 10 minutes then sit back and relax for 30 minutes. Totally recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Patty OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: It does not get hot enough. Also a little hard to fold & store
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Item @ Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Like having a spa without having to travel! It was easy to set up, enjoyable to use and I'm totally in love with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Elou

customer_reviews.title: Great product, crappy chair.
customer_reviews.text: The only things I would change is adding heat panels to the front, and having a more comfortable chair (the chair is truly awful). Otherwise it would be a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: TLP

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and durable for convenient home use
customer_reviews.text: I have had my portable sauna for 2 years now and absolutely love it. It is very convenient for home use and easy to store. It relieves my joint pain and my energy levels are higher after use. It's lightweight but very durable. I really enjoy mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This is a must buy, when I tell you this sauna is the really deal.
customer_reviews.author: Erika sunmola

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the it’s! For real. 5 stars. People are way too picky. I am honest with my reviews and this deserves 5 stars. I dig it.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: I live in the UK. I could not used ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in the UK. I could not used it since it has an American plug. Waited bought one which would not work on the sauna plug. Then bought another one and the light power turn red I thought '' victory''. But when I put myself into the sauna and ready to use the light went off. Could not switch it back on again.. Is it because of the plug? Should I buy a third adaptor? Sadly I waited too long after purchasing before trying it. Not even sure that I can still send it back.... Such a shame...
customer_reviews.author: patrick ntienou ntienou

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love it!
customer_reviews.text: And you can't beat the convenience of a sauna right in your own home...relaxing too
customer_reviews.author: KimD

customer_reviews.title: Great product, everything as promised
customer_reviews.text: This is everything it promised!! Built well and works great. With my hypothyroidism it's difficult to detox and drop unhealthy weight. This does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my portable sauna. I used at least 4 times a week after each work out! I would purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Falessia B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my personal sauna. The seat is small but comfortable for my body size. I sweat a lot and very relaxing. I warm mine up for 5 minutes before I get into it to make sure I get a really good sweat after 20 minutes in it. I would recommend this product to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Kay S.

customer_reviews.title: Good potable sauna
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom and she loved it. It’s really portable and easy to store away. The matierial is actually pretty good and it holds up. So far it hasn’t gone bad on me and my mom still uses it today.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this and I LOVE it!! With four stars already I decided to take my chances and I'm glad I did! It heats up super fast and gets way hotter than the sauna at the gym. I put a towel around my neck to trap more of the heat and I sweat so much I can't even do 30 minutes! Definitely worth your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use and  works well
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to set up and use. I was hesitant to buy it, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: olderandwiser

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price...! Perfect at home sauna...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my needs... the only thing I would change is the chair... i will get a nice chair to put in there that is more comfortable...
customer_reviews.author: creativebebe

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing!!!! It heats up quickly and feel better after each time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The sides don't stay up as well as I would like to. And the chair is small. But overall, wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get really hot. You have to let it warm up for about 30 minutes before you get in.
customer_reviews.author: LB

product_meta.title: Radiant Saunas Rejuvinator Portable Personal Sauna with FAR Infrared Carbon Panels, Heated Floor Pad, Canvas Chair
product_meta.description: Enjoy relaxation on the go with the Rejuvenator Portable Sauna. This gorgeous, personal sauna features 3 carbon heating panels that evenly distribute heat, blanketing your body in soothing warmth. An included foot heater provides an additional layer of relaxation. Its canvas seat is perfectly designed to fit within the sauna, and is constructed with tubular steel for strength and durability. Easy, one-minute set up makes it simple to enjoy your sauna anywhere you go. Its moisture-resistant fabric provides protection against humidity. And when you’re done, this portable sauna's collapsible design makes it easy to transport or store.
feature_bullets: SOOTHING WARMTH – FAR infrared heat surrounds your body, thanks to three low-EMF carbon heating panels. Each heater is precisely placed for even, steady heat.

1 MINUTE SET-UP – Six, easy steps convert this handy device into a personal paradise. Simply unfold the sauna, plug it in, and enjoy nourishing warmth in any location. When you’re finished, this space-saving, personal sauna easily contracts for storage.

RELAX ANYWHERE – This portable sauna is easy to take on the go. A collapsible design conveniently folds for transport or storage. Its moisture-resistant fabric allows for outdoor use, making it a perfect addition to your deck or campsite.

CANVAS SEATING – Foldable chairs are included with this feature-rich sauna. It also comes with a comfortable collar, sewn-in pockets for books or devices, a relaxing foot pad, and a convenient, hand-held control.

ONE-YEAR WARRANTY – Your sauna comes with a one-year manufacturer warranty. Your item will arrive damage free with all necessary parts and accessories. If something goes wrong, we'll work tirelessly until you're satisfied with your sauna.
Includes fabric cabin, neck collar, Beech dowel frame, 3 heating panels, remote control, portable chair, foam floor mat, heated foot pad, ionizer.900 watts
